text:
Being at HBS, we are
incredibly lucky.

But this opportunity comes
with the responsibility

For me that means
showing up for others.

I want to create opportunities
and foster conditions that

I want to remove
barriers for others

so that they can
thrive and achieve

I will help people tell
their extraordinary stories,

shine a light on the common
threads that bond us all.

I will live authentically
and make it easy for others

I want us all to choose
courage over comfort,

to dream big, and work to unlock
the limitless possibilities

for those who do not
yet have a voice.
